verses.roman:
mora ei icchā yadi tomāra prasāde haya
ei nivedana mora kara, dayāmaya

synonyms: mora—my; ei—this; icchā—desire; yadi—if; tomāra prasāde—by Your mercy; haya—is; ei nivedana—this submission; mora—my; kara—just do; dayā-maya—O merciful one.
translation: "O most merciful Lord, if by Your mercy it is possible, kindly grant my desire.
